extensionDescription.message: Secure your files & messages using encryption!

termsIntro.message: Before you can use this browser extension, you must review the associated End-User License Agreement and Privacy Policy:

termsEULALink.message: Click here to read the End-User License Agreement

termsEULACheckbox.message: I have read and agree to the End-User License Agreement

termsPrivacyLink.message: Click here to read the Privacy Policy

termsPrivacyCheckbox.message: I have read and agree to the Privacy Policy

termsFailText1.message: To use this browser extension, all users must agree to the End-User License Agreement and Privacy Policy.

termsFailText2.message: If you do not agree with either of these documents, please uninstall this browser extension from Firefox.

termsFailLink.message: Click here to find out how.

warningWeakPassword.message: Weak passwords are easier to guess and could make your message vulnerable to attackers. We recommend securing your message with a stronger password.

warningProceed.message: Would you like to proceed anyway?

warningSaveFile.message: You cannot view this encrypted file again, once you navigate away from this page.

donateText.message: Data Padlock is a free browser extension supported solely by the support of users like you. Please consider making a donation.

encryptSave.message: Press the '$BUTTON$' button below to save the encrypted file.

encryptHowToDecryptText.message: To decrypt this message later, you can load the encrypted file into this browser extension and unlock it using the password that you just set.

encryptHowToDecryptFile.message: To decrypt this file later, you can load the encrypted file into this browser extension and unlock it using the password that you just set.

decryptSaveWarningText.message: Pressing the '$BUTTON$' will save the decrypted message to your device.

decryptSaveWarningFile.message: Pressing the '$BUTTON$' will save the decrypted file to your device.

errorMultipleFiles.message: Can only use 1 file at a time

errorFileAlreadyEncrypted.message: This file has already been encrypted!

versionExplain1.message: The file you are attempting to decrypt was created using

versionExplain2.message: of the $EXTENSIONNAME$ extension and, therefore, cannot be opened using this version.

versionExplain3.message: To decrypt this file, you will need to download the correct version of $EXTENSIONNAME$.

versionWarningDecryptOnly.message: Older versions of $EXTENSIONNAME$ should only be used to decrypt data.

versionWarningNoEncrypt.message: New data should never be encrypted using an old version.
